name: Southbound Euro Bus Sims- Kids Motorcade Parking

description:
BUS DRIVING TEST

Good morning driver. Welcome to your first day at work. Before you can join the team, a driving test has been scheduled for you. We have some more candidates in line today, so you will need to be extra careful and steady with your bus driving test, if you wish to make the job.

It’s a simple routine exercise, drive through the painted paths and stops at the market spots. That should get the job done! Good Luck


FIRST DAY AT JOB

Good job! You beat each driver by a long way. Now it’s time for your first day on the job. We’re giving you a simple suburbia route to begin with, to practice your real-life bus driving skills. This will just be a start for bigger things to come!

On your work tenure at the station you will be given various city speed buses to drive across different parts of the city. You will be faced with challenging conditions as well on your tasks.


VARIOUS CITY SPEED BUSES AT YOUR DISPOSAL

Complete the jobs driving and unlocking various city speed buses like, Basic City, city, school, articulated, tour and luxury coaches. Unlock the Bonus Bus 6/9 by successfully completing the levels.


BRILLIANTLY DESIGNED GAMEPLAY LEVELS

Each level is thoroughly designed for the ultimate city speed bus simulation experience. The challenging weather, timed and location based challenges will keep the best simulator champions on their toes. The difficulty gets more and more unbearable, as the players will have to avoid collisions to vehicles, navigate in rainy conditions, stay alert of turbo police cars and ambulances rushing by and stopping whenever a road or railway crossing approaches.


FEATURES

- Simple and adaptable simulator controls
- 10 detailed levels of bus driving madness
- Detailed suburban city environments with challenging weather conditions
- Unlockable simulator city speed buses and bonus achievements
